abstract: Jon Stewart, host of The Daily Show, and Stephen Colbert of the Colbert Report, paid tribute to Steven P. Jobs, co-founder of Apple.
snippet: Jon Stewart, host of The Daily Show, and Stephen Colbert of the Colbert Report, paid tribute to Steven P. Jobs, co-founder of Apple.
lead_paragraph: Jon Stewart, host of The Daily Show, and Stephen Colbert of The Colbert Report, paid tribute to Steven P. Jobs, co-founder of Apple, on Thursday night after he died on Wednesday.

headline.main: Comedy Central Weighs In on Steve Jobs
